Web

A mycelial commons for building the Coherence Engine together — slow, sturdy, and consent‑first.

Join the community Read the latest

Mycelial invitations

Bring a question, a dataset, or a pain worth composting. We practice in public, with receipts: ROOT → VALVE → CLASP → TRACE → MIRE → SCAR → COMPOST → ECHO → SPORE.

Chorus Circles

Lightweight co‑working and show‑your‑receipts sessions. We tune membranes, not megaphones.

  • 25‑min sprints + 5‑min spans
  • ECHO check‑ins, not status theater

Pattern Guild

Consent and provenance patterns you can reuse: VALVE refusals, CLASP envelopes, TRACE spans.

  • Living pattern library
  • Receipts you can run

Field Pilots

Wastewater intelligence, bio‑digital interop, and community data collaboratives — small, honest smokes.

  • Signed SPORE previews
  • Reader‑recoverability metrics

How to participate

  • Start small: propose a 30‑minute smoke test with a clear ROOT.
  • Share receipts, not just results: CLASP envelopes, TRACE spans, SPORE exports.
  • Contribute a pattern or a post‑mortem — we compost our learnings.
Join & introduce yourself Email the stewards

Community covenant

Be kind, be clear. Consent before cadence. Trace what you love. Make merges reversible. We design for dignity and repair by default.
